problem.markdown:
>>In a developing country, the growth rate of the population of a small village is 7%. How many years would it take for the population of this village to double? Give your answer as a whole number without units.<<
= 10
[explanation]
The equation for calculating doubling time is as follows:
Doubling time = 70/growth rate = 70/7 = 10 years
[explanation]
